title: 10 Min Porter & Davis Sq-- FREE Parking & Laundry - All Utilities Incl
posting_body: Unbelievable deal on a 1 bedroom apartment located only 10 minutes from both Porter and Davis Squares with great access to the Red line MBTA and downtown Boston.
Apartment features an OFF- STREET Parking spot included in rent, hardwood floors, disposal, FREE laundry and ALL Utilities included (includes internet and cable).
Unit does not have an oven, it has a two burner electric range and plenty of counter space for a toaster oven.
Please make sure to view all the pictures before contacting me for more information.
